name: My Cute Commissar
description:
My Cute Commissar – a satirical historical visual novel with a “match3”-type gameplay. Participate in the political struggle of communist Russia in the 1920s! Take power into your own hands or make the party leader Trotsky or Stalin! Get to know the leaders of the communist movement. Fire up the fire of the world revolution or build communism in a one country.

This game does not contain non-tolerance, any symbols of any political organizations and anything like that. Only love and mutual understanding. Make Match3, not war ♥

Features:

  • Satirical historical love story
  • Variable ending
  • Two gamemodes
  • Classic gameplay: match3 and visual novel
  • Lofi hip hop by G374
